content: in this legal case there was a dispute between two parties referred to as vd and lk the case involved the division of an estate the parties reached a compromise which was approved by the court according to the compromise vd would become the sole owner of a specific immovable property and a vehicle lk agreed to delete entries in the land registry related to inheritance property the court ordered vd to pay the costs of the proceedings and refund half of the state fee an appeal can be lodged within 2 days additionally there was another dispute between party a and party b party b was ordered to compensate party a for excess loss party a also agreed to delete entries in the land registry and become the sole owner of the property the court approved the compromise and refunded the state fee to party a the time limit for filing an appeal was shortened
